tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited to see Dr Suneela for Allergy Testing for my daughter as she has allergic rhinitis. I was very pleased by Dr Suneela‘a professional , polite and precise approach  and she was patient and  wonderful to my 11 year old daughter . My daughter was very very anxious to have skin prick allergy test but Dr Suneela was very quick to build rapport with her and explained the procedure so well to my daughter such that it allayed her anxiety completely. 

Myself being a doctor in UK and having lived there for 15 years I must say Dr Suneela was excellent and comparable to any , in fact better than specialist doctors in UK . Thank you Dr Suneela

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ******* ***** ** *** ** *** **** ************** * **** **** ***** ** ******** *** Unfortunately with a lot of paediatricians I have come across, my children just seemed like another job, But Dr. Suneela Nayak actually cares about the kids she treats. I would recommend her to other parents for their children to come and see for any medical issues they may have. *** ** *** **** ************* * **** ***** ** ********** *** ******* ***** ** ***** *** ** *** **** ************ ******** **** **** *** *** ******** ** ****** ** **** *** Thank You!! Dr. Suneela Nayak

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had been to clinic as my 6 month old baby was suffering from food allergy and cough. I felt fulfilled. 1. Front office staff were polite and addressed all our concern even though it was a last minute appointment.2. Doctor is very friendly, and made a note of all our concern, gave suggestions, did a proper check up, suggested mild medicine also asked to continue with old medicine given by my old doctor. She spent ample amount of time interacting with us including baby. 3. over all experience was very good4. most important my baby recovered in just 2 days

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Suneela is very patient and friendly with children. I take both my sons (6 year old and 3 year old) to her and they both totally like her.  
She is also very patient when it comes to explaining the illness to us parents. Our older son has a dust allergy. She, not only explained to us in detail many preventative steps but also, how the medications work. We did have many questions - she answered them all - in detail and sincerely.
In all, we are all very happy with her. I would definitely recommend her as a paediatrician.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We recently visited this clinic due to my kid was down with dry cough. Dr. Suneela said it seems wheezing issue and she prescribed an inhaler with Foracart without any proper examine. It’s a type of steroid. After two times using, it developed too much reddish inside the throat and sivior throat pain.. The pain increased and developed too worse while eating and drinking. And seen rashes on his face. Skin in His hands are pealing off. He missed his final all his exams due to this. Think about his parents situation. ** *** * ******* ** **** *** ********* *** *** ***** *** ******* **** ******* *** ************ **** ********** ******* ****** ******* ** *** ******* *** **** ** ********* ****** **** ** ** ************ ** * ****** *** *** ***** ** ** **** **** ***** ** *********** ****** * **** ******* ********* **** *** ***** ******* ***** *** ** ****** *** ** ****** ********* Please don’t ever try to meet her for medical treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The Doctor was extremely friendly and took the time to explain the condition of the toddler in an elaborate way. 
She put the toddler at ease and was extremely professional.
I would encourage her to keep this going and I will highly recommend her to friends and family without hesitation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Suneela was friendly, warm *** **** ************* while making decisions regarding treatment of my child. She was extremely patient with my little one and very thorough with her examination. The clinic is bright and child friendly. I also found the clinic staff to be courteous and helpful.  Overall, I’ve always had a good experience and I highly recommend Dr.Suneela Nayak.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Suneela spends time with patient and understands the concerns. I visited her for my 5 year old son having problems with sweat and excessive exercise. She explained that there is no test required for this and explained the cause of the same in great details. She was even ready to consult over the email.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ********** Bad service. We visited the Dr. For our son. Next day when we called her as our son was not keeping well. Reception lady told that she will arrange the call back soon. We waited for a long time but did not receive any call from her side. We called her thrice but she was ready with the same answer. At last when we called her, she told doctor had left for the day. This is how you treat your patients????

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I will highly recommend Dr Nayak.  Today we visited for my daughter, suffering from fever. She asked about all the previous medications , treatment details and sign & symptoms and also She spent sufficient time for the following:

Counselling 
Vital sign and physical examination 
Collecting previous medical history and treatment details
Explanation about probability & possibility of root cause
Explanation about safety of patient ************ ***** ********* **** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Nayak is the perfect modern doctor. ******** ************* and willing and able to address all queries for new parents. 

Her bedside manner is great. Shes lovely with the child. She addresses all questions with a pragmatic and practical approach. 

The clinic is bright, airy and welcoming. 

We have switched from our current doctor to her for good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Paediatric Emergency  Care,stomach and intestinal infections,
review:
I had a very satisfying consultation for my 16 month old daughter, with Dr Suneela. She was extremely detailed in her diagnosis, was able to provide an explanation and calm a mother's nerves very effectively. I would recommend her highly.
Thanks again Dr Suneela.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Nayak spent considerable time examining my child for a prolonged dry cough which was making her quite miserable.  Dr. Nayak took a complete history of previous treatment, what worked what did not and advised next line of treatment accordingly.  Her honest, straightforward and candid approach is much appreciated.
